description.en: This scroll gives a random skill bonus to your weapon. If the weapon already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.ar: This scroll gives a random skill bonus to your weapon. If the weapon already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.br: Este pergaminho garante um bônus de habilidade aleatório à sua arma. Se a arma já tiver um bônus, ele será substituído.
description.cns: 此卷轴会让你的武器获取随机技能增益效果。如果该武器已经有了技能增益效果，它将被覆盖。
description.de: Diese Schriftrolle gibt deiner Waffe einen zufälligen Bonus. Wenn die Waffe bereits einen Bonus hat, wird dieser überschrieben.
description.fi: This scroll gives a random skill bonus to your weapon. If the weapon already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.fil: This scroll gives a random skill bonus to your weapon. If the weapon already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.fr: Ce parchemin donne un bonus d'aptitude aléatoire sur votre arme. Si l'arme a déjà un bonus, il sera remplacé.
description.id: Scroll ini memberikan bonus skill acak untuk senjatamu. Jika senjata sudah memiliki bonus, itu akan ditimpa.
description.it: This scroll gives a random skill bonus to your weapon. If the weapon already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.jp: この巻物は武器にランダムでボーナスステータスを付与します。既にボーナスが付いている場合は上書きされます。
description.kr: 이 두루마리는 무기에 랜덤 보너스를 제공합니다. 무기에 이미 보너스가 있는 경우 새로운 보너스를 적용시킵니다.
description.nl: This scroll gives a random skill bonus to your weapon. If the weapon already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.pl: This scroll gives a random skill bonus to your weapon. If the weapon already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.ru: This scroll gives a random skill bonus to your weapon. If the weapon already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.sp: Este pergamino otorga un bonus aleatorio a tu arma. Si el arma ya tiene un bonus se sobreescribirá.
description.sw: This scroll gives a random skill bonus to your weapon. If the weapon already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.th: ให้โบนัสสกิลแบบสุ่มแก่อาวุธของคุณ หากอาวุธมีโบนัสอยู่แล้ว จะถูกทับ
description.tw: 可使用在武器上獲得額外的能力增幅，若你的物品已獲得加成的話，將會覆蓋掉
description.vi: Cuộn này mang lại một phần thưởng kỹ năng ngẫu nhiên cho vũ khí của bạn. Nếu vũ khí đã có tiền thưởng, nó sẽ bị ghi đè.
